value:
Sean Morgan: Alright, I'm making
this video to talk about

fasting. Now, in the last 36
hours, I only drank water with

lemon juice. And I did this for
a couple of different reasons.

One, I was having some trouble
with some chronic fatigue. About

eight years ago, I got Lyme
disease, and it turned into

chronic Lyme and I had a lot of
complications. Luckily, I've

been pretty much symptom free
for a while now, except for

sometimes I get tired a lot. So
I decided to do it fast. You

know, I live in Brazil, I have a
Brazilian wife and something

about Brazilian wives is that
they love to feed you a lot. And

so I've been eating a lot and
made probably eating meals that

are too big. And I decided, even
though I have some extra weight,

I know it's hard to see from
here, but I do have some extra

weight here. And so I decided,
hey, it's perfectly safe for me

to do a fast. And so that was
one of the reasons, the chronic

fatigue, a little bit
overweight, but also just to

clean out my system. And so this
is what I did. I drank only

water with lemon juice for 24
hours. So I slept, you know,

slept eight hours as I normally
do. Obviously, it wasn't eating

when I was sleeping. So I was
fasting while I was sleeping.

And then the next day, I didn't
eat anything. And it was a

little bit difficult. I have to
admit, when I stop eating, when

I do fast like this, I have the
thing, this thing happens to me

where I stopped going into the
planning mind my, my brain

completely switches modes and
goes to being totally present in

the moment, and not doing any
planning, and no analysis. Now

for my job doing the politics
channel on YouTube, I have to do

a lot of analysis. So I
purposefully chose a day where I

didn't have any interviews, and
I didn't have a lot of work to

do. So I could just rest I've
got actually really tired and

weak from not eating Of course.
Now some people claim to get

lots of energy when they fast.
I'm not one of those people. And

so I became present, I was
better able to meditate. I
really wasn't hungry, but I had

weird kind of energy in my body
like feeling of tension in my

body wasn't exactly hunger, it
was more like, see, I'm taking

probiotics and so I had an empty
stomach. And those probiotics

were like eating and digesting
all the undigested material that

was in my stomach and digestive
tract. So there was lots going

on, it literally felt like the
inside of my body was going

through a carwash. And so these
probiotics were cleaning out my

system. And so I had a little
bit of trouble falling asleep, I

drank some tea that helps with
that. So I purposefully did not

drink anything with sugars. So
nothing like juice or honey or

anything like that. Only water
and a little bit of tea. And

then I slept soundly all night.
And when I woke up, I felt like

a different person, I felt more
clarity in my mind, I felt my

body felt lighter and better.
Kind of like when you get a flu

or a sickness or something and
then you recover and then you

feel better than you ever felt
before when you recover. That's

how I felt this morning when I
broke my fast. So I actually

have a personal trainer they
came over to my house I worked

out this morning and then I
drank yerba Mata. Now, yerba

latte has something in it that
affects me Is it a really cleans

out my digestive tract so it
forces bad stuff out. So this

morning. I know I'm getting
graphic here. But this is really

important about health. I had
bowel movement that just got rid

of what I believe are a whole
bunch of toxins that were in my

body. And of course I was
exercising and sweating and

getting those toxins out. I have
to say after this fast, and

after working out in
conjunction, I feel better than

I felt in such a long time. And
so I feel my vibrations getting

higher. Lots of good things
happen to me in the last 24

hours as well which I'm happy
about So, so just this is my

little video about how I do a
one day water fast. And maybe in

the future. I'll try dry
fasting. I've never done it

before. I've tried intermittent
fasting and there are all types

of benefits. And so, if you
haven't looked up the word

autophagy, check it out. It's an
amazing process that your body

goes through, to eat away at the
old non sparking cells in your

body. And, you know, your body
is so intelligent, it

purposefully chooses the right
material to digest and get rid

of during a fasting process to
keep you alive, and to clean out

your body and to optimize your
body. And so I'm not a health

experts, I'm not a medical
professional, this is not

medical advice. You should
strive to stay alkaline when you

do fasting. That's why I did
the, the lime juice and, and if

you're skinny, I wouldn't
recommend fasting either you

want to build up your body and
make a strong before you would

do fasting. But it's amazing
spiritual experience. For me, I

feel like I said, more presence
less analytical. And I

appreciate food so much more.
Now, when I wrote my fast today,

I taste the food. Like I've
never tasted food before. It's

such a sharp, potent, amazing
thing to eat now, and I

appreciate food more and I don't
overeat like I did before. So a

lot of things. taste receptors,
a lot of different things seem

to have been reset with this
little short fast. So I'm going

to make more of a habit of doing
this and track my results and

share it on this channel. And if
you want to do a fast,

intermittent fasting or
ketogenic fasting or water

juice, fasting, dry fasting, all
these different things if you

want to try it out in a
controlled environment and do a

retreat, I'd be happy to do that
with you in Brazil or remotely.

So that a breakthrough Brazil
calm if you want to learn more
about that. Thanks.
